title: Fireside With the Underboss - "He Told Chin Gigante To Go F** Himself"
description: Chin Chigante gets word that one of his own guys is talking bad about him behind his back. Sammy tells us the story of who it was and how Chin took brutal revenge.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Chin Chigante gets word that one of his own guys is talking bad about him behind his back. Sammy tells us the story of who it was and how Chin took brutal revenge.
itunes:summary: Chin Chigante gets word that one of his own guys is talking bad about him behind his back. Sammy tells us the story of who it was and how Chin took brutal revenge.
